comments:
I've downloaded and installed "all in one" BIRT 2.1RC0 and it seems to be broken in a major way:

- I can create a data source, but I cannot edit it. When I try, I get this in the log:

Julio, did you extract the all-in-one package to a new Eclipse folder on to an existing installation of Eclipse?

I installed it to a folder which already had BIRT (2.1M5). 

I just installed it again to a clean directory this time, and everything is working fine. Sorry about that. Feel free to close the bug.
Install on a fresh Eclipse folder solve the issue.
